name: Where Are My Parents?
description:
Where Are My Parents is a 2D role-playing game created by Maya, Jacob, William, and Catherine in the span of 4-6 days at COSMOS UCSC 2017, in the Video Game Design Cluster. The player assumes the role of a bioluminescent creature attempting to find its parents by finding watermelon to progress to the next level.

Music and Sound by Jacob | Artwork by Catherine and Maya | Narration by Catherine and Maya | Coding by William (mostly) | Level Design by Jacob and William

Thank you to our instructors: Ben, Elizabeth, Marcelo, Jonathan, and Matthew for helping us through this process!!
